data.title: Star Adrianne Curry to Host Bridal Show Expo at Bridal Expo 2011 at the Rialto Square Theatre
data.meta_description: Star Adrianne Curry to Host Bridal Show Expo at  Bridal Expo 2011 at the Rialto Square Theatre - Channahon-Minooka, IL -
data.text:
Adrianne Curry, 2003 America’s Next Top Model Winner & Star of VH-1’s “The Surreal Life” and “My Fair Brady” will return to host Bridal Expo 2011 at the Rialto Square Theatre. “The Rialto is one of the most beautiful buildings I have ever seen in America, and can only be compared to what I have seen in Italy, Russia, and France” states Adrianne Curry. “I am really excited to be able to walk through its’ doors again, especially to help others with THEIR weddings! Until you have traveled the states and the world as much as I have, you cannot appreciate just how special the Rialto is...and I feel special to have been invited back!” Adrianne Curry and Christopher Knight married on May 29, 2006 in Joliet, IL and held their wedding reception at the Rialto Square Theatre.

Bridal Expo 2011 at the Rialto sponsored by Turk Furniture is scheduled for Sunday, January 23, 2011 at 11am with the fashion show beginning at 2:30pm. Bridal Expo 2011 features a fabulous runway fashion show, over 50 wedding expert vendors, and thousands of dollars in prizes and wedding gifts. Tickets for Bridal Expo 2011 are on sale now and are priced at $10 per person in advance or $15 per person day of event. Tickets may be purchased at the Rialto Box Office located at 102 N. Chicago Street, or ordered by calling 815/726-6600 between 9am and 5pm Monday through Friday. On performance days the box office remains open until the completion of intermission. Tickets may also be purchased by calling 800-982-2787 through all Ticketmaster outlets or online at www.ticketmaster.com or www.rialtosquare.com. The Rialto Square Theatre is located at 102 N. Chicago Street; Joliet.

Know someone planning a wedding? Don’t let them do ANYTHING before visiting Bridal Expo 2011 at the Rialto Square Theatre. Meet the area’s BEST wedding professionals all under one roof! Check out our spectacular Bridal fashion show hosted by a New York runway model! From flowers to photographers to caterers to bridal gowns, to DJ’s to limousines to honeymoons and gifts you’ll find it all in ONE location. FIND new ideas; RECEIVE expert advice; SAVE time and money; DISCOVER all your options. Thousands of dollars in prizes and wedding gifts will be given away! There is so much to see and do at Bridal Expo 2011 at the Rialto Square Theatre, you could literally plan your entire wedding in one day.
